    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2607</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The movement of HAlley's comet in the solar system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bewegung von Kometen HAlleys im Solarsystem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement de la comète de HAlley dans le 
système solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento do cometa de HAlley no sistema solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento della cometa del HAlley nel sistema 
solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μετακίνηση του κομήτη HAlley's στο ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento del cometa de HAlley en la Sistema 
Solar</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates the way in which Halley's comet moves among the planets in the solar system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates die Methode, in 
der Komet Halleys unter den Planeten im Solarsystem bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui demostrates la voie dont la 
comète de Halley se déplace parmi les planètes dans le système 
solaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demostrates a maneira em que o 
cometa de Halley se move entre os planetas no sistema solar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che demostrates il modo in cui la 
cometa del Halley si muove fra i pianeti nel sistema solare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates ο τρόπος με τον οποίο
κινήσεις κομητών Halley μεταξύ των πλανητών στο ηλιακό 
σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demostrates la manera de la 
cual el cometa de Halley se mueve entre los planetas en la Sistema 
Solar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Komet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comète</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cometa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cometa</string>
